item.title: Cardiometabolic health across menopausal years is linked to white matter hyperintensities up to a decade later.
item.description: Schindler, L. S., Subramaniapillai, S., Ambikairajah, A., Barth, C., Crestol, A., Voldsbekk, I., Beck, D., Gurholt, T. P., Topiwala, A., Suri, S., Ebmeier, K. P., Andreassen, O. A., Draganski, B., Westlye, L. T., & de Lange, A. M. G. (2023). Cardiometabolic health across menopausal years is linked to white matter hyperintensities up to a decade later. Frontiers in Global Women’s Health, 4, 1320640.doi: 10.3389/fgwh.2023.1320640
